definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
in the depth of one's soul

sentences.english: If you give an option of failure deep within yourself, you will fail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你內心深處給了自己失敗的選項，你將會失敗。

sentences.english: This flitting cheerfulness was always at the farther extremity of some long vista through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 這種轉瞬即逝的歡悅總是出現在森林縱深處。

sentences.english: Aloft in the air, as if from the depths of the cloud, came a confused and doubtful sound of voices.
sentences.chinese: 高空中，彷彿自雲團深處，傳來一片可疑的嘈雜人聲。

sentences.english: But light struggled with dark in Nixon's soul.
sentences.chinese: 然而，光明與黑暗的對決卻蟄伏於他的內心深處。

sentences.english: There's something inside us that loves a good monster.
sentences.chinese: 在我們人類內心深處，喜歡有一個好的妖怪。

sentences.english: One bait was down forty fathoms.
sentences.chinese: 有個魚餌下沉到四十英尋的深處。

sentences.english: In fact, it is one that will shake him-and many others-to the core.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，真相讓他和很多人內心深處受到極大震撼。

sentences.english: They speak to the deeper history of painting.
sentences.chinese: 它們在向繪畫的歷史深處訴說。

sentences.english: He made the women aware of his presence and they all went to the deep end.
sentences.chinese: 那些女人發現了他的存在，都游到了最深處。

sentences.english: Its quantity of heat and the far-infrared can rapidly penetrate the skin points deep place.
sentences.chinese: 其熱量和遠紅外線能迅速穿透皮膚穴位深處。

sentences.english: Cli : (Swam knows deep down that what Grovyle says is true.
sentences.chinese: 內心深處，他知道森林蜥蜴說的是真的。

sentences.english: Even when deep inside we know it can t be.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕在內心深處我們清楚這不可能。

sentences.english: Then he heard a clanking noise deep down below .
sentences.chinese: 接着他聽見地下深處傳來一陣叮噹聲。

sentences.english: Feelings are like waters, the shallow murmurs, but the deep are dumb.
sentences.chinese: 感情如流水，淺處淙淙有聲，深處默默無語。

sentences.english: Do not take for granted the thins closest to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 不要對內心深處的東西漠然視之。

sentences.english: In 2009, a team of British cavers investigated a recently uncovered cave in a remote Vietnamese jungle.
sentences.chinese: 年，一羣英國洞窟專家到越南中部森林深處探險。

definition: to hug/to cherish/within the bosom (of the family)/to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)
bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)
